verses.verse: וַיִּזְכֹּ֤ר <WH2142> remembered אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> And God אֶת־ <WH853> נֹ֔חַ <WH5146> Noah וְאֵ֤ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הַֽחַיָּה֙ <WH2416> and every living thing וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הַבְּהֵמָ֔ה <WH929> and all the cattle אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after אִתּ֖וֹ <WH854> in בַּתֵּבָ֑ה <WH8392> that [was] with him in the ark וַיַּעֲבֵ֨ר <WH5674> to pass אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> and God ר֙וּחַ֙ <WH7307> a wind עַל־ <WH5921> over הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the earth וַיָּשֹׁ֖כּוּ <WH7918> asswaged הַמָּֽיִם׃ <WH4325> and the waters

וַיִּסָּֽכְרוּ֙ <WH5534> were stopped מַעְיְנֹ֣ת <WH4599> The fountains תְּה֔וֹם <WH8415> also of the deep וַֽאֲרֻבֹּ֖ת <WH699> and the windows הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> of heaven וַיִּכָּלֵ֥א <WH3607> was restrained הַגֶּ֖שֶׁם <WH1653> and the rain מִן־ <WH4480> from הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> from heaven

וַיָּשֻׁ֧בוּ <WH7725> returned הַמַּ֛יִם <WH4325> And the waters מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> from הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> from off the earth הָל֣וֹךְ <WH1980> steadily וָשׁ֑וֹב <WH7725> receded וַיַּחְסְר֣וּ <WH2637> were abated הַמַּ֔יִם <WH4325> the waters מִקְצֵ֕ה <WH7097> and after the end חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> and fifty וּמְאַ֖ת <WH3967> of the hundred יֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> days

וַתָּ֤נַח <WH5117> rested הַתֵּבָה֙ <WH8392> And the ark בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <WH7637> in the seventh בְּשִׁבְעָה־ <WH7651> seven עָשָׂ֥ר <WH6240> teen י֖וֹם <WH3117> day לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH2320> of the month עַ֖ל <WH5921> upon הָרֵ֥י <WH2022> upon the mountains אֲרָרָֽט׃ <WH780> of Ararat

וְהַמַּ֗יִם <WH4325> And the waters הָיוּ֙ <WH1961> become הָל֣וֹךְ <WH1980> continually וְחָס֔וֹר <WH2637> decreased עַ֖ד <WH5704> until הַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הָֽעֲשִׂירִ֑י <WH6224> the tenth בָּֽעֲשִׂירִי֙ <WH6224> in the tenth בְּאֶחָ֣ד <WH259> [month] on the first לַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <WH2320> [day] of the month נִרְא֖וּ <WH7200> seen רָאשֵׁ֥י <WH7218> were the tops הֶֽהָרִֽים׃ <WH2022> of the mountains

וַֽיְהִ֕י <WH1961> came מִקֵּ֖ץ <WH7093> And it came to pass at the end אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> of forty י֑וֹם <WH3117> days וַיִּפְתַּ֣ח <WH6605> opened נֹ֔חַ <WH5146> that Noah אֶת־ <WH853> חַלּ֥וֹן <WH2474> the window הַתֵּבָ֖ה <WH8392> of the ark אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עָשָֽׂה׃ <WH6213> which he had made

וַיְשַׁלַּ֖ח <WH7971> And he sent forth אֶת־ <WH853> הָֽעֹרֵ֑ב <WH6158> a raven וַיֵּצֵ֤א <WH3318> which went forth יָצוֹא֙ <WH3318> to וָשׁ֔וֹב <WH7725> and fro עַד־ <WH5704> until יְבֹ֥שֶׁת <WH3001> were dried up הַמַּ֖יִם <WH4325> until the waters מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> from הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> from off the earth

וַיְשַׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> Also he sent forth אֶת־ <WH853> הַיּוֹנָ֖ה <WH3123> a dove מֵאִתּ֑וֹ <WH854> for לִרְאוֹת֙ <WH7200> from him to see הֲקַ֣לּוּ <WH7043> were abated הַמַּ֔יִם <WH4325> if the waters מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> from פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> from off the face הָֽאֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> of the ground

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> no מָצְאָה֩ <WH4672> found הַיּוֹנָ֨ה <WH3123> But the dove מָנ֜וֹחַ <WH4494> no rest לְכַף־ <WH3709> for the sole רַגְלָ֗הּ <WH7272> of her foot וַתָּ֤שָׁב <WH7725> and she returned אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> about אֶל־ <WH413> to him הַתֵּבָ֔ה <WH8392> unto him into the ark כִּי־ <WH3588> for מַ֖יִם <WH4325> for the waters עַל־ <WH5921> was on פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> [were] on the face כָל־ <WH3605> of all הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the whole earth וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> then he put forth יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> his hand וַיִּקָּחֶ֔הָ <WH3947> and took her וַיָּבֵ֥א <WH935> and pulled her in אֹתָ֛הּ <WH853> אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> about אֶל־ <WH413> about הַתֵּבָֽה׃ <WH8392> unto him into the ark

וַיָּ֣חֶל <WH2342> And he stayed ע֔וֹד <WH5750> yet שִׁבְעַ֥ת <WH7651> seven יָמִ֖ים <WH3117> days אֲחֵרִ֑ים <WH312> yet other וַיֹּ֛סֶף <WH3254> and again שַׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> he sent forth אֶת־ <WH853> הַיּוֹנָ֖ה <WH3123> the dove מִן־ <WH4480> from הַתֵּבָֽה׃ <WH8392> out of the ark

וַתָּבֹ֨א <WH935> came in אֵלָ֤יו <WH413> about הַיּוֹנָה֙ <WH3123> And the dove לְעֵ֣ת <WH6256> toward עֶ֔רֶב <WH6153> evening וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> and behold עֲלֵה־ <WH5929> leaf זַ֖יִת <WH2132> [was] an olive טָרָ֣ף <WH2965> pluckt off בְּפִ֑יהָ <WH6310> and lo in her mouth וַיֵּ֣דַע <WH3045> knew נֹ֔חַ <WH5146> so Noah כִּי־ <WH3588> for קַ֥לּוּ <WH7043> were abated הַמַּ֖יִם <WH4325> that the waters מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> from הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> from off the earth

וַיִּיָּ֣חֶל <WH3176> And he stayed ע֔וֹד <WH5750> unto him any more שִׁבְעַ֥ת <WH7651> seven יָמִ֖ים <WH3117> days אֲחֵרִ֑ים <WH312> yet other וַיְשַׁלַּח֙ <WH7971> and sent forth אֶת־ <WH853> הַיּוֹנָ֔ה <WH3123> the dove וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יָסְפָ֥ה <WH3254> not again שׁוּב־ <WH7725> which returned אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> about עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> yet

וַֽ֠יְהִי <WH1961> came בְּאַחַ֨ת <WH259> [month] the first וְשֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> And it came to pass in the six מֵא֜וֹת <WH3967> hundredth שָׁנָ֗ה <WH8141> and first year בָּֽרִאשׁוֹן֙ <WH7223> in the first בְּאֶחָ֣ד <WH259> the first לַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <WH2320> [day] of the month חָֽרְב֥וּ <WH2717> were dried up הַמַּ֖יִם <WH4325> the waters מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> from הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> from off the earth וַיָּ֤סַר <WH5493> removed נֹ֙חַ֙ <WH5146> and Noah אֶת־ <WH853> מִכְסֵ֣ה <WH4372> the covering הַתֵּבָ֔ה <WH8392> of the ark וַיַּ֕רְא <WH7200> and looked וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> and behold חָֽרְב֖וּ <WH2717> was dry פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> and behold the face הָֽאֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> of the ground

וּבַחֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH2320> month הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <WH8145> And in the second בְּשִׁבְעָ֧ה <WH7651> on the seven וְעֶשְׂרִ֛ים <WH6242> and twentieth י֖וֹם <WH3117> day לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH2320> of the month יָבְשָׁ֖ה <WH3001> dried הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> was the earth ס
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> And God אֶל־ <WH413> to נֹ֥חַ <WH5146> unto Noah לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

צֵ֖א <WH3318> Go forth מִן־ <WH4480> out הַתֵּבָ֑ה <WH8392> of the ark אַתָּ֕ה <WH859> you וְאִשְׁתְּךָ֛ <WH802> thou and thy wife וּבָנֶ֥יךָ <WH1121> and thy sons וּנְשֵֽׁי־ <WH802> wives בָנֶ֖יךָ <WH1121> and thy sons' אִתָּֽךְ׃ <WH854> for

כָּל־ <WH3605> every הַחַיָּ֨ה <WH2416> with thee every living thing אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> after אִתְּךָ֜ <WH854> for מִכָּל־ <WH3605> of all בָּשָׂ֗ר <WH1320> that [is] with thee of all flesh בָּע֧וֹף <WH5775> [both] of fowl וּבַבְּהֵמָ֛ה <WH929> and of cattle וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> and every הָרֶ֛מֶשׂ <WH7431> and of every creeping thing הָרֹמֵ֥שׂ <WH7430> that creepeth עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> upon the earth [הֹוצֵא כ] (הַיְצֵ֣א <WH3318> after ק) אִתָּ֑ךְ <WH854> for וְשָֽׁרְצ֣וּ <WH8317> that they may breed abundantly בָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> in the earth וּפָר֥וּ <WH6509> and be fruitful וְרָב֖וּ <WH7235> and multiply עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> upon the earth
וַיֵּ֖צֵא־ <WH3318> went forth נֹ֑חַ <WH5146> And Noah וּבָנָ֛יו <WH1121> and his sons וְאִשְׁתּ֥וֹ <WH802> and his wife וּנְשֵֽׁי־ <WH802> wives בָנָ֖יו <WH1121> and his sons' אִתּֽוֹ׃ <WH854> for

כָּל־ <WH3605> [and] whatsoever הַֽחַיָּ֗ה <WH2416> Every beast כָּל־ <WH3605> every הָרֶ֙מֶשׂ֙ <WH7431> every creeping thing וְכָל־ <WH3605> and every הָע֔וֹף <WH5775> and every fowl כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> everything רוֹמֵ֣שׂ <WH7430> creepeth עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> upon the earth לְמִשְׁפְּחֹ֣תֵיהֶ֔ם <WH4940> after their kinds יָצְא֖וּ <WH3318> went forth מִן־ <WH4480> from הַתֵּבָֽה׃ <WH8392> out of the ark

וַיִּ֥בֶן <WH1129> builded נֹ֛חַ <WH5146> And Noah מִזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> an altar לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וַיִּקַּ֞ח <WH3947> and took מִכֹּ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> of every הַבְּהֵמָ֣ה <WH929> beast הַטְּהוֹרָ֗ה <WH2889> of every clean וּמִכֹּל֙ <WH3605> every הָע֣וֹף <WH5775> fowl הַטָּהֹ֔ר <WH2889> and of every clean וַיַּ֥עַל <WH5927> and offered עֹלֹ֖ת <WH5930> burnt offerings בַּמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <WH4196> on the altar

וַיָּ֣רַח <WH7306> smelled יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> רֵ֣יחַ <WH7381> savour הַנִּיחֹחַ֒ <WH5207> a sweet וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> and the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> in לִבּ֗וֹ <WH3820> his heart לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not אֹ֠סִף <WH3254> I will not again לְקַלֵּ֨ל <WH7043> curse ע֤וֹד <WH5750> again אֶת־ <WH853> הָֽאֲדָמָה֙ <WH127> the ground בַּעֲב֣וּר <WH5668> sake הָֽאָדָ֔ם <WH120> any more for man's כִּ֠י <WH3588> for יֵ֣צֶר <WH3336> for the imagination לֵ֧ב <WH3820> heart הָאָדָ֛ם <WH120> of man's רַ֖ע <WH7451> [is] evil מִנְּעֻרָ֑יו <WH5271> from his youth וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not אֹסִ֥ף <WH3254> neither will I again ע֛וֹד <WH5750> again לְהַכּ֥וֹת <WH5221> smite אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> every חַ֖י <WH2416> any more every thing living כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> I עָשִֽׂיתִי׃ <WH6213> as I have done

עֹ֖ד <WH5750> While כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> remaineth הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> While the earth זֶ֡רַע <WH2233> seedtime וְ֠קָצִיר <WH7105> and harvest וְקֹ֨ר <WH7120> and cold וָחֹ֜ם <WH2527> and heat וְקַ֧יִץ <WH7019> and summer וָחֹ֛רֶף <WH2779> and winter וְי֥וֹם <WH3117> and day וָלַ֖יְלָה <WH3915> and night לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not יִשְׁבֹּֽתוּ׃ <WH7673> shall not cease
